settings.title: The Monday Gives Back Initiative
settings.text:
We’ve been really lucky to have a brand that continues to grow each year. With that attention and success, it’s important for us to give back and we’re committed to making an impact. The most attention and excitement comes whenever we release a new collection so we decided to start using that to bring awareness to the causes and foundations that are important to us by pairing them with collections we know you guys will love.

So far we’ve focused our efforts on three main pillars: conservation, women’s health, and access to mental health care. We’re dedicated to highlighting and contributing to at least two charities in our main Summer and Resort seasons along with continuing our community outreach like we have in the past by donating meals to essential healthcare workers or contributing to wildfire funds. Learn about the charities we’re grateful to support below.

settings.title: Planned Parenthood
settings.text:
As a women owned and runned company we want to help ensure all women can get the healthcare they need. That's why we are donating 15% of all proceeds now through September 30th to Planned Parenthood.

Planned Parenthood is a trusted health care provider, an informed educator, a passionate advocate and a global partner helping similar organizations around the world. Planned Parenthood delivers vital reproductive health care, sex education, and information to millions of people worldwide.

settings.title: CATF: The Clean Air Task Force
settings.text:
15% of orders placed from June 20 - June 29 from our Cloud Collection will go directly to The Clean Air Task Force.

The Clean Air Task Force is a fact-based and environmental organization, that builds momentum for solutions based on scientific evidence, intellectual integrity, and pragmatism. Their mission is to push the technology and policy changes needed to achieve a zero-emissions, high-energy planet at an affordable cost. With meeting the world’s rising energy demand in a way that is financially, socially, and environmentally sustainable as their vision. While setting goals to achieve zero-emissions energy, waste, agricultural, and forest management systems by 2050.

settings.title: BREEF - Bahamas Reef Environment Education Foundation
settings.text:
15% of proceeds from our Jade Jacquard & Sea Jacquard Collection from May 2, 2022 through August 2, 2022 were donated directly to BREEF.

BREEF is an important part of the conservation and education on marine ecosystems in The Bahamas and the world. From providing on-the-ground instruction for Bahamians to be stewards of the environment and advocating for strong policy, to actively restoring reef habitat and representing the region internationally, BREEF has a successful multi-pronged approach to protecting the marine environment.

settings.title: National Coalition Against Domestic Violence
settings.text:
10% of proceeds from all orders placed from March 14, 2022 through March 20, 2022 were donated to the National Coalition Against Domestic Violence.

The National Coalition Against Domestic Violence is a nonprofit organization committed to leading, mobilizing and raising their voices to support efforts that demand a change of conditions that lead to domestic violence such as patriarchy, privilege, racism, sexism, and classism. They are dedicated to supporting survivors and holding offenders accountable and supporting advocates.

settings.title: Breast Cancer Research Foundation
settings.text:
15% of proceeds from all orders placed from October 13, 2021 through October 20, 2021 were donated to the Breast Cancer Research Foundation.

The Breast Cancer Research Foundation is a nonprofit organization committed to achieving the end of breast cancer. They provide critical funding for cancer research worldwide to fuel advances in tumor biology, genetics, prevention, treatment, metastasis, and survivorship.

settings.title: The Surfrider Foundation
settings.text:
15% of the proceeds from our Sea Jacquard Collection went directly to The Surfrider Foundation -- Los Angeles, Chapter.

The Surfrider Foundation is a nonprofit environmental organization that is dedicated to the protection and enjoyment of the world’s ocean, waves and beaches, for all people, through a powerful activist network.

settings.title: One Tree Planted
settings.text:
For every order placed from May 12 through May 31 2021, Monday Swimwear donated directly to One Tree Planted to plant trees in areas of reforestation. 1 purchase = 1 tree planted.

One Tree Planted is a 501C3 non-profit with a focus on global reforestation. As an environmental charity, they are dedicated to giving back to the environment, creating a healthier climate, protecting biodiversity and helping in reforestation efforts around the world -- all by planting trees.

settings.title: Wildlife Conservation Society
settings.text:
15% of the proceeds from our Tiger Collection will go directly to Wildlife Conservation Society.

WCS's goal is to conserve the world's largest wild places in 14 priority regions, home to more than 50% of the world's biodiversity. WCS focuses on the protection of species while developing an ambitious plan to engage with a rapidly changing world.

settings.title: Ocean Conservancy
settings.text:
15% of the proceeds from our Azure Blue Collection went directly to Ocean Conservancy.

Ocean Conservancy works with the public to protect the ocean from today’s greatest global challenges. Together, it’s possible to create science-based solutions for a healthy ocean, the wildlife, and the communities that depend on it.

settings.title: Breast Cancer Research Foundation
settings.text:
15% of the proceeds from our Baby Pink Collection went directly to BCRF.

The Breast Cancer Research Foundation is a nonprofit organization committed to achieving prevention and a cure for breast cancer. They provide critical funding for cancer research worldwide to fuel advances in tumor biology, genetics, prevention, treatment, metastasis and survivorship.

settings.title: Open Path Collective
settings.text:
15% of the proceeds from our Sky Blue Collection went directly to Open Path Collective.

Open Path Psychotherapy Collective is a non-profit nationwide network of mental health professionals dedicated to providing in-office and online mental health care—at a steeply reduced rate—to individuals, couples, children, and families in need.

settings.title: Amazon Conservation Team
settings.text:
15% of the proceeds from our Amazonia Collection went directly to Amazon Conservation Team.

The Amazon Conservation Team partners with indigenous and other local communities to protect tropical forests and strengthen traditional culture. They believe that the survival of the forest depends on the fate of its guardians. We protect both.

settings.title: The Loveland Foundation
settings.text:
15% of the proceeds from our Key Lime Collection went directly to The Loveland Foundation.

With the barriers affecting access to treatment by members of diverse ethnic and racial groups, the Loveland Therapy Fund provides financial assistance to Black women and girls seeking therapy nationally. Loveland Therapy Fund recipients will have access to comprehensive lists of mental health professionals across the country.

settings.title: World Wildlife Fund
settings.text:
10% of the proceeds from our Amur Leopard Collection went to WWF to help protect the endandgered Amur Leopards.

WWF works to help local communities conserve the natural resources they depend upon; transform markets and policies toward sustainability; and protect and restore species and their habitats. Their efforts ensure that the value of nature is reflected in decision-making from a local to a global scale.
